text: - My name is Rachel Kelly,

I'm a Senior Customer
Solutions Manager at AWS,

supporting media and
entertainment customers.
A Customer Solution Manager works closely
with the Account Manager,
who's the salesperson focused
on the end-to-end customer relationship,
and with the Solutions Architect
who has the technical view.

We are the voice of the
customer making sure
that the team stays customer-obsessed
and focused on what is gonna be best

for the customer's long
term cloud journey on AWS.

I think the biggest surprise
since I've joined is how warm
and welcoming everyone has been.
There's kind of a reputation
of Amazon having a really tough culture.
It's such a broad, large, diverse group.

There are communities
for basically everything.

There's the AWS Memes Slack
channel, which cracks me up.

There's the Catholics at
Amazon group, which is great.
I've joined for regular prayer,
which I never thought I would do at work.
There's Amazon Parents.
There's all these different groups,

and so you look around,
there's somebody like you

and you kind of find your
people, which is awesome.
Why join AWS?

Because we are solving
complicated problems for industry,
which are really cool to solve.
It's really fun.
